comments.raw_text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #589441 +++

Per comment 27 & 28 in bug 589441, I'm filing this as a followup to question the behavior of restoring your session from a crash if you have your browser set to clear recent history at exit.
comments.creator: paul@oshannessy.com
comments.author: paul@oshannessy.com
